items.name: Banarasee Handwoven Semi-Silk Saree (Yellow)
items.description: Handwoven semi-silk yellow saree with zari border — closest match to the traditional festive look.

items.name: Moda Rapido Non-Padded Stretchable Saree Blouse (Red)
items.description: A simple, stretchable, non-padded red saree blouse with round neck and short sleeves — perfect contrast for yellow zari sarees and celebrity-inspired festive looks.

items.name: Griiham Gold Plated Beaded Jewellery Set
items.description: Elegant gold-plated beaded jewellery set from Griiham, matching the festive traditional saree look.

items.name: Campus Sutra Women’s Double-Breasted Fleece Long Coat – Stylish Winter Overcoat for Casual & Everyday Wear
items.description: Buy the Campus Sutra women's double-breasted fleece long coat featuring lapel collar, long sleeves, and button closure. Perfect winter overcoat for casual, everyday, and celebrity-inspired looks.

items.name: Louis Vuitton LV Biker PM Bag in Black — Deepika Padukone Inspired Look
items.description: The original Louis Vuitton LV Biker PM Bag in black, as seen on Deepika Padukone. This luxury piece features a structured silhouette, premium black leather, signature LV hardware, and bold biker-inspired detailing. A rare collector's accessory with high resale value on StockX.

items.name: Similar Bag: Haute Sauce Black Clairemont Sling Bag With Detachable Strap
items.description: A stylish and budget-friendly alternative inspired by the silhouette of Deepika Padukone’s Louis Vuitton LV Biker Bag. Crafted from premium vegan leather, this black Clairemont sling bag features a detachable strap, minimal gold-tone hardware, and a versatile design perfect for everyday chic and transitional looks.

items.name: H&M Black Crossbody Bag – Coated Fabric with Detachable Strap
items.description: H&M black crossbody bag crafted in coated fabric featuring two handles, zip closure, a tab with a metal fastener, and a detachable adjustable shoulder strap. Dimensions: 25 cm (W) × 15 cm (H) × 15 cm (D).

items.name: FabSeasons Women White Long-Brim Sun Hat
items.description: A wide long-brim white sun hat inspired by Deepika Padukone’s elegant editorial look. Lightweight, summer-friendly design with a structured brim for a chic silhouette.

items.name: RAG & CO Women Pointed Toe Mid-Top Bow Detail Stiletto Ankle Boots
items.description: Pointed-toe mid-top stiletto ankle boots by RAG & CO with bow detail on the back, microfiber upper and cushioned footbed — stylish for high-fashion and evening wear.
